docs.text: Warning Charmed free5GC is currently in Beta free5GC is an open source 5G core network. Use it to operate your own private mobile network. To learn more about free5GC, visit the official website .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Deploy Charmed free5GC Requirements free5GC must be installed on a Kubernetes cluster with the following specifications: Kubernetes : A cluster with a total of a minimum of 6 vCPUs and 16 GB of RAM. Juju : A Juju controller with access to the Kubernetes cluster Getting Started Install microk8s with the necessary add-ons: snap install microk8s --classic microk8s enable dns microk8s enable storage microk8s enable community microk8s enable multus Install free5GC juju deploy free5gc-amf-operator --trust --channel = edge juju deploy free5gc-pcf-operator --trust --channel = edge
docs.title: Deploy Charmed free5GC

docs.text: free5GC must be installed on a Kubernetes cluster with the following specifications: Kubernetes : A cluster with a total of a minimum of 6 vCPUs and 16 GB of RAM. Juju : A Juju controller with access to the Kubernetes cluster
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: Install microk8s with the necessary add-ons: snap install microk8s --classic microk8s enable dns microk8s enable storage microk8s enable community microk8s enable multus
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: juju deploy free5gc-amf-operator --trust --channel = edge juju deploy free5gc-pcf-operator --trust --channel = edge
